Remove all transformations so predict_segmentation works with any image size and returns same sized output than input.

predict_segmentation_fastai[source]

predict_segmentation_fastai(path_to_model:"Path to pretrained model file", path_to_image:"Path to image to annotate", outfile:"Path and filename for output raster", processing_dir:"Directory to save the intermediate tiles. Deleted after use", tile_size:"Tile size to use. Default 400x400px tiles", tile_overlap:"Tile overlap to use. Default 100px", use_tta:"Use test-time augmentation"=None)

Segment image into land cover classes with a pretrained models TODO save also information about label and class TODO add test-time augmentations
